name: The drop to the top
description:
Description :

This is a simple two player game. The goal in this game is to make the highest stack of figures. You have two minutes to make the highest stack.

Keyboard controls:

Player 01:

  • S: Drop figure
  • A/D: Push figure left/right when it is dropped.

Player 02: 

  • Down arrow: Drop figure
  • Left/Right arrow: Push figure left/right when it is dropped.
  • Escape: Quit the game
  • R: Restart the game

Good luck and have fun
